resources.string:
1. Keep Cube in an orientation such that, 
 a) Green center piece is facing you 
 b) White center piece is above 
 c) Yellow center piece is below 
 
 2. Start Scanning the faces of the cube in the below order 
 (UP,RIGHT,FRONT,DOWN,LEFT,BACK) 
 1. White 
 2. Red 
 3. Green 
 4. Yellow
 5. Orange 
 6. Blue
 
 3. Verify the scanned colors, if any mistake simply modify the scanned string
